content:
### Bug fixes

* [AWS SQS:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.awssqs.md) Fixed an issue with API version and casing
* [IMAP:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.emailimap.md) Fixed re-connection issue
* [Keap:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.keap.md) Fixed an issue with the Opt In Reason parameter
* [Salesforce:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.salesforce.md) Fixed an issue with loading custom fields
